title: Mac Problems
body:
Since the latest patch, I am have issues with the LOL Client for Mac.

The Problems are:
1. The Game starte really slow.  At first the little running circle in the right bottom corner does not turn at all.  After about 20 seconds the percentages go up and I am almost always last to load.  It used to be vice versa.
2. Graphic Issues:  The Performance is really bad.  I used to have above 60fps at normal.  Now it often drops below 10.  Playing with more than 3 players on the screen is nearly impossible.  Putting down graphic settings won't work or will result in a frozen client.  After that trying to log on is not possible.

Please fix the problems.  Currently playing League is not possible with a mac.

Thank You

Client Version: V 7.10-4442781.4442074
Computer:
Mac Book Pro 2013
2,8 GHz Intel Core i/
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 1024MB

replies.body: I have had this same issue since the release of 7.9 and riot doesn't seem to care to fix it :(

I'm having the same problem. My FPS used to be around 60. Now ARAM is 30 FPS and I just played two Ascension games a in a row with 15 FPS lol

I had problems loading into games in 7.9 and now it's even worse.
Did riot outsources their tech team?

Can confirm I'm having similar problems with Mac as of this 7.10.  In 7.9, any map would be 80FPS dipping down to 75FPS. 

For whatever reason, Rift seems a little worse (80FPS dipping down to 60ish), but ARAM is atrociously bad (30FPS  dipping down to 15ish FPS).

This is with graphics settings turned all the way down (I messed with it in a custom, couldn't get FPS in ARAM to go up regardless)

Same issue I am having with my 2 macs. Client crashes during game. It is so sad that a big company ad RIOT does not provide a good fix. And the worst part, I got banned several times 
I have a good Mac book pro and also a Mac mini
Is your computer getting really hot and then having connectivity issues? I find that's an issue with my Mac and I have no idea what to do!
I have been having similar problems with both the load screen and in game performance since 7.10. (mid-2014 MacBook Pro)

Same thing here also. MacBook Pro Late-2013 Retina display. I used to always be first to load in now before every game after champion select the blue loading circle at the bottom freezes and the displays where champ splash arts typically are, are blank. eventually after significant time it will load. When loading to 100% it loads in sync with some other players. I already submitted a ticket. Very frustration to play when this happens. In game, I also am experiencing significant ping spikes and FPS drops while playing on the lowest quality and playing right next to my high-speed router.

These issues could be a combination of issues caused by an unstable connection struggling to communicate information between players in-game or even launching your client.  You'll want to go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to optimize your network and clear this up.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I've gone through the list for possible solutions and nothing have fixed the minor crash and slow loading speed during the loading screen into the game.

I've always been the one loading in first, and I know that my internet isn't the issue.

Is this a issue I can fix by myself or is this something I should wait for Riot to fix.
This issue only recently started during Patches 7.9 and 7.10

Thanks for the info!  Our tech guys would like to take a closer look to see what's going on.  Grab some logs from the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can dig a bit deeper.  We'll reply back as soon as we can, thanks your help!

I am having these exact FPS issues on my Macbook Retina 13inch (Mid 2014). I have always gotten 30-98 fps. Now all of a sudden i'm getting annoying frame drops during Ascension mode that just opened this weekend(May 19-May 23, 2017) as low as 12-17 which is beyond ridiculous. I hope riot plays close attention to the MAC Client.

Can confirm, experiencing both problems which didn't happen before.

It doesn't seem to be any sort of connection issue; I have a steady 60 ping in game.
